page.title: 15CRANLEIGH YOUTH ACTIVITIES
page.content: { Scout and Guide movement The non-stop activities at the brick Scout "hut" and Guide room show the movement's strength in the year in which it celebrates 85 & 75 years, respectively, since foundation. Five Brownie Packs, four Guide Companies, Cub Packs and Scout Troups meet each week. Older children, aged 15+, join a mixed group of Venture Scouts who enjoy canoeing and outdoor pursuits. We saw Brownies entertaining elderly friends with tea, stories and poems. Cubs gave a grand howl and played ball games. All sleeves showed many badges. {St.John's ambulance Other children become cadets with the St. John's Brigade and learn first aid and other ways of helping people. They provide care at many local functions.
